title: Wakagashira

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to Rig a player. Rigged players will have an additional anonymous vote against them the next day, and their own vote will not count.
- You can Rig four times.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Instead of voting regularly, you may send your vote "Anonymously", making it appear as if you abstained, but still adding your vote as an anonymous player.
- Factional kill
- Factional chat
- Can skip your night to convert into a Yakuza Boss or Yakuza Killing, if there are no members of those subalignments.
- Cannot spawn regularly. Must be converted into.

desc:
Post 4193
*Right below the Oyabun, the Wakagashira manage regional gangs and make sure things carry out smoothly.*
